title: Ticket #1248: CMake staging
description:
Dependencies on: #1195 & #1241

In order to be able to properly stage the cmake changes there are a few prerequisites, namely the fixing of the glue to be on a per-branch basis. This becomes an issue when there is a need to add in a completely different way in which we build. The logic to add the extra case is silly and confounded.

Secondly the notion of maintaining Imake for the sole purpose of building standard universe seems rather silly. After discussing the matter with psilord, he assures me that the building of stduniverse has been long overdue for a cruft removal which would greatly simplify the transition, and after walking through it with him I am in agreement. This would allow us to make a smooth transition and bring stduniverse into the fold and leave no outliers.
remarks:
Updates to show stalled on tickets, feel free to reassign once unstalled.

2010-May-03 15:46:45 by tstclair:
I'm cleaning up a 1st pass staging to get it ready once the glue is in place.
  • finished pushing all changes to current cmake branch
  • pulled new branch from current head
    • removed cruft (there is a lot)
    • pulling in changes (in progress)

2010-Aug-13 20:40:17 by kooburat:
  • CPackDeb.cmake and CPackRPM.cmake is added for reference only. It has to put into CMake module folder in order to use it
  • condor_drone rpm cannot be ported into CMake build right now because currently CPackRPM does not support component install
  • "fakeroot make package" must be used to build Debian packages
  • Issues reported by lintian about Debian packages
    • binary-or-shlib-define-rpath - (eg. /usr/bin/condor_hold) Using rpath is not recommended by Debian
    • unstripped-binary-or-object - (eg. /usr/bin/condor_hold)
2010-Oct-20 16:03:30 by jfrey:
Bulk change of target version from v070504 to v070505 using ./ticket-target-mover.

2010-Nov-15 00:43:09 by kooburat:
  • Enabled native packaging build
    • Split remote_task into 3 stages
      1. Compile and create normal tar file
      2. Reconfigure cmake to use native package path
      3. Recompile(minimum) and create native package
  • Integration with CMake 2.8.3
    • Custom CPackDeb module is removed from source tree since it is included into 2.8.3
    • Still rely on custom CPackRPM module.
  • Condor-drone RPM is not included in this build. CMake does not currently support component RPM. May need extra build pass in order to add this RPM back to the build process.
